paper_abstract: This paper gives a first numerical comparison of the Discontinuous-Galerkin-(DG) and Spectral-Difference-Method (SD) under almost equivalent conditions for smooth test cases. (C) 2012 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A comparison of the Discontinuous-Galerkin- and Spectral-Difference-Method on triangulations using PKD polynomials
